songs.title: Forget You
songs.lyrics:
I see you driving 'round town
With the girl I love and I'm like
Forget you
Oo, oo, ooo
I guess the change in my pocket
Wasn't enough I'm like
Forget you
And forget her too!
I said, if I was richer, I'd still be with her
Ha,ain't that some shh (ain't that some shh)
And although there's pain in my chest
I still wish you the best I'm like
Forget you!
Oo, oo, ooo

Yeah I'm sorry, I can't afford a ferrari
But that don't mean I can't get you there
I guess she's a xbox and I'm more of an atari
But the way you play your game ain't fair

I pity the fool that falls in love with you
( she's a gold digger just thought you should know sugar)

I've got some news for you
Yeah go run and tell your little boyfriend

I see you driving 'round town
With the girl I love and I'm like
Forget you
Ooh, ooh, ooooh
I guess the change in my pocket
Wasn't enough I'm like
Forget you
And forget her too!
I said, if I was richer, I'd still be with ya
Ha, now ain't that some shh (ain't that some shh)
Though there's pain in my chest
I still wish you the best I'm like
Forget you!
Oo, oo, ooo

Now I know, that I had to borrow
And beg and steal and lie and cheat
Tryin to keep ya, trying to please ya
Cause being in love with you ain't cheap

I pity the fool that falls in love with you
(she's a gold digger just thought you should know sugar)
(just thought you should know )
Ooooooh
I've got some news for you
Ooh! I really hate you right now

I see you driving 'round town
With the girl I love and I'm like
Forget you
Oo, oo, ooo
I guess the change in my pocket
Wasn't enough I'm like
Forget you
And forget her too!
I said, if I was richer, I'd still be with ya
Ha, now ain't that some shh (ain't that some shh)
Though there's pain in my chest
I still wish you the best, I'm like
Forget you!
Oo, oo, ooo

Now baby, baby, baby, why'd you wanna wanna hurt me so bad?
(so bad, so bad, so bad)
I tried to tell my mamma but she told me
"this is one for your dad"
(your dad, your dad, your dad)
Uh! Whyyy? Uh! Whyyy? Uh!
Whyyy lady? Oh! I love you!! Oh!
I still love you!! Oooh..........!

I see you driving 'round town
With the girl I love, I'm like
Forget you
Oo, oo, ooo
I guess the change in my pocket
Wasn't enough I'm like
Forget you
And forget her too!
I said, if I was richer, I'd still be with ya
Ha, now ain't that some shh (ain't that some shh)
And although there's pain in my chest
I still wish you the best, I'm like
Forget you!
Oo, oo, ooo
